categories: Category:Learn to Read with Star Wars

nodes.text: Learn to Read with Star Wars: Leia Level 2

Learn to Read with Star Wars: Leia Level 2 is a box set collecting four Level 2 young-readers titles in the DK Readers series. The collected books include Star Wars: Fearless Fighters (Simon Beecroft, Pablo Hidalgo), Ahsoka: Jedi in Training (Heather Scott), A Queen's Diary (Beecroft), and Rey to the Rescue! (Lisa Stock). It was published by DK Publishing on December 12, 2017, and was available exclusively through retailer Barnes & Noble.
